text: If you want to destroy an object when its health reaches 0, what code would be best in the blank below?
feedbackCorrect: Since the “health” variable is an int, anything less than 1 would be “0”. The sign for “less than” is “<”.
feedbackIncorrect: Since the “health” variable is an int, anything less than 1 would be “0”. The sign for “less than” is “<”.
